official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for services furnished by physician extenders.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to expand coverage the supplementary medical insurance program to include physician extender services to the extent recognized under State law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for services furnished by physician extenders.
